summary: My entry for the Dragonborn DLC Contest on Steam. Adds a new short quest line to Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
Important: Requires Dragonborn 

--------------- 
Introduction: 
--------------- 
This is my submission to the Dragonborn DLC Contest for the Creation Kit Group. It adds a short questline on Solstheim as well as quite a few other things. This is pretty much the final version seeing as its a contest submission. Again, requires Dragonborn. Enjoy! 

------- 
Story: 
------- 
A Dunmer researcher has discovered an ancient Dwemer tower located towards the southern coast of Solstheim where few have dared to tread for centuries. After a research accident, the ruin\'s defenses lept back into action and the research slowed to a stop. Will you help uncover the secrets of the Tower of Nchunak? 

----------- 
Features: 
----------- 
A Custom Voiced Follower 
A Short Questline 
-Two Quests and a Side Quest 
Two New Locations 
-A dangerous Dwemer ruin 
-with a maze (that\'s right, a MAZE) 
-A mysterious Cottage 
A new group of Weapons 
-Craftable once you find the book: Odd Dwemer Weaponry 

--------- 
Quests: 
--------- 
Dwemer Dilemma - Research has come to a stop and needs a wayward adventurer to kick start it. 

Nchunak\'s Maze - Research has restarted and the perilous maze awaits. 

East Empire Expedition - Discover a secluded laboratory housing some of the secrets of Nchunak. 

---------------- 
Voice Actors: 
---------------- 
Faldris - Lord Darkga 
Dravis - Physics Steve 
Melina - MMFane 

------ 
Bugs: 
------ 
None 

----------- 
Conflicts: 
----------- 
Should be none. 

------------- 
Installation: 
------------- 
Remember, Requires Dragonborn. 

Click Install with NMM and let it do its thing

or

Click Manual Installation
Open the file with 7zip or something
Add the contents to you Skyrim\\Data Folder
author: Lord Darkga
